ygData.subject: Re: Getting our Concerns Noticed
ygData.msgSnippet: ... As I stated before, write up a well written essay on the subject, send it to Smedley, and hope he does something about it.  That s the only realistic way
ygData.messageBody:
>But, I would like to know others opinions on how we should bring our
>concerns to the people who just might actually do something about it.

As I stated before, write up a well written essay on the subject, send it
to Smedley, and hope he does something about it. That's the only realistic
way to get his attention.

I finally played with my pet last night, and have to say that in a party
situation it's pretty useless. When fighting in a party we tend to go
after yellows a lot more, but most yellows will smack my pet in three
blows, so I end up tanking for my pet!

Brian
